root.name: frameRate()
root.description: Specifies the number of frames to be displayed every second. If the processor is not fast enough to maintain the specified rate, it will not be acheived. For example, the function call frameRate(30) will attempt to refresh 30 times a second. It is recommended to set the framerate within tsetup(). The default rate is 60 frames per second.

parameter.label: fps
parameter.description: int: number of frames per second
